page.title: 07HOSPITAL SUTTON COLDFIELD
page.content: { Good Hope Hospital}was built in 1952/3, having previously been the site of{Good Hope House,}owned by a Mr Winter,maker of malt loaves. Every year about 20000 in-patients, 90000 out-patients and 40000 emergency patients use Good Hope's{18 wards, } these being:6 maternity;1 children's; 1 geriatric;4 medical;3 surgical;2 orthopaedic and 1 intensive care unit. { A staff of 1475,}including{500 nurses is employed in Good Hope,which costs about{Â£14.5 million}to run annually. About 4000 babies are born each year in Good Hope-although numbers are {decreasing}every year.The number of boys and girls{born}is approximately the same and they weigh an average of six pounds.Mothers may leave the hospital with their{babies}between 48hrs and 6 days after their birth.
